EarthdataLogin.cookie_error:
IMPORTANT: There was an error obtaining a download cookie!

New users: you must first log into Hyp3 and accept the EULA. In addition, your Study Area must be set at Earthdata https://urs.earthdata.nasa.gov
EarthdataLogin.urs_error:
IMPORTANT: There was a problem communicating with URS, unable to obtain cookie.
Try cookie generation later.
